data.text: With this, you are now responsible for Suzuka.
data.name: Suzuka's Trainer
data.processed: <story>With this, you are now responsible for Suzuka.

data.text:
Understood. So I don't betray Suzuka's expectations, 
I'll give her my full support.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Understood. So I don't betray Suzuka's expectations, 
<story>I'll give her my full support.

data.text:
I apologize for saying such a selfish thing. 
For taking care of me until now, I'm very grateful.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>I apologize for saying such a selfish thing. 
<story>For taking care of me until now, I'm very grateful.

data.text:
I wanted to chase your dream with you, but now that it's 
come to this, it can't be helped. It's unfortunate… but it's 
what you've chosen yourself, Suzuka. You have my respect.
data.name: Suzuka's Trainer
data.processed:
<story>I wanted to chase your dream with you, but now that it's 
<story>come to this, it can't be helped. It's unfortunate… but it's 
<story>what you've chosen yourself, Suzuka. You have my respect.

data.text:
With such strong feelings, Suzuka, you'll definitely be 
fine! Make sure you grab hold of your dream in <Sirius>!
data.name: Suzuka's Trainer
data.processed:
<story>With such strong feelings, Suzuka, you'll definitely be 
<story>fine! Make sure you grab hold of your dream in <Sirius>!

data.text: Understood…!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Understood…!

data.text: Um… Please treat me well.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Um… Please treat me well.

data.text:
Uoooooo~! Welcome to the team!! Spe-chan, you've been constantly 
worried about Suzuka, aren't you glad too?
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>Uoooooo~! Welcome to the team!! Spe-chan, you've been constantly 
<story>worried about Suzuka, aren't you glad too?

data.text:
Ehehe… well, that's true but, 
when you say it like that it's kind of embarassing…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Ehehe… well, that's true but, 
<story>when you say it like that it's kind of embarassing…

data.text:
Alright, I know it's kind of sudden, but let's 
start with race observation practice.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Alright, I know it's kind of sudden, but let's 
<story>start with race observation practice.

data.text:
I say that, but it's fine if you don't think too hard about it. 
Just like you did before, just run as you desire.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>I say that, but it's fine if you don't think too hard about it. 
<story>Just like you did before, just run as you desire.

data.text:
I say that, but it's fine if you don't think too hard about it. 
Just like you did before, just run as you desire.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>I say that, but it's fine if you don't think too hard about it. 
<story>Just like you did before, just run as you desire.

data.text: As I desire… understood.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>As I desire… understood.

data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…

data.text: …Fuuu!!!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…Fuuu!!!

data.text: Fuwaah…!? What amazing speed!?
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Fuwaah…!? What amazing speed!?

data.text:
And doesn't she keep accelerating?! 
Straight for the goal like this?!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>And doesn't she keep accelerating?! 
<story>Straight for the goal like this?!

data.text: And with that incredible speed, she stole the show.
data.processed: <story>And with that incredible speed, she stole the show.

data.text:
Hahahaa… If she makes it to the goal like this, 
things will become hectic…
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Hahahaa… If she makes it to the goal like this, 
<story>things will become hectic…

data.text:
Hahahaa… If she makes it to the goal like this, 
things will become hectic…
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Hahahaa… If she makes it to the goal like this, 
<story>things will become hectic…

data.text: Haa… haa… haa… haa…!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Haa… haa… haa… haa…!

data.text: Haa… haa… Hn…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Haa… haa… Hn…

data.text: Haaa… haaa… Fuuu~…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Haaa… haaa… Fuuu~…

data.text: Running and running like that, are you okay?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Running and running like that, are you okay?

data.text: Running and running like that, are you okay?
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Running and running like that, are you okay?

data.text:
…I-I'm… fine. My pacing is an absolute mess… 
and my time is horrible… but…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>…I-I'm… fine. My pacing is an absolute mess… 
<story>and my time is horrible… but…

data.text: It felt… very good… and was fun…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>It felt… very good… and was fun…

data.text:
Even though she was breathing heavily, Silence Suzuka had a 
satisfied look on her face. How much fun she had was obvious.
data.processed:
<story>Even though she was breathing heavily, Silence Suzuka had a 
<story>satisfied look on her face. How much fun she had was obvious.

data.text:
Even just watching was fun. Just thinking about what would happen 
if you ran all the way to the goal like that.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Even just watching was fun. Just thinking about what would happen 
<story>if you ran all the way to the goal like that.

data.text:
Just like this, let's figure out a running style for Suzuka, 
together! Alright, how about running one more?!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Just like this, let's figure out a running style for Suzuka, 
<story>together! Alright, how about running one more?!

data.text: …Yes!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…Yes!

data.text:
I was watching today's training. I don't recall any of the books 
in the library containing THAT kind of running.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
<story>I was watching today's training. I don't recall any of the books 
<story>in the library containing THAT kind of running.

data.text:
It was terrible, wasn't it? 
Not even thinking about my pace, just running any way I wanted.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>It was terrible, wasn't it? 
<story>Not even thinking about my pace, just running any way I wanted.

data.text:
Geez… even though you're aware of just how bad it was, 
you're still saying it as if you're having fun.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
<story>Geez… even though you're aware of just how bad it was, 
<story>you're still saying it as if you're having fun.

data.text: No way, I wasn't really having fun talking about it… Fufuu.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>No way, I wasn't really having fun talking about it… Fufuu.

data.text:
Running while ignoring common sense- even like 
that, for some reason, it feels like the "scenery" 
I want to see is becoming clearer.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Running while ignoring common sense- even like 
<story>that, for some reason, it feels like the "scenery" 
<story>I want to see is becoming clearer.

data.text:
…even I don't know what to say. Compared to 
your previous running style, I feel more of a 
sense of wonder from this absurd new one.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed:
<story>…even I don't know what to say. Compared to 
<story>your previous running style, I feel more of a 
<story>sense of wonder from this absurd new one.

data.text: Of course, that doesn't mean I intend to lose to you.
data.name: Air Groove
data.processed: <story>Of course, that doesn't mean I intend to lose to you.

data.text: I'm looking forward to racing against you, Air Groove.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>I'm looking forward to racing against you, Air Groove.

data.text:
Run! Run! Silence Suzuka! She's making her great escape! 
Pulling away from the pack as they enter the final straight!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Run! Run! Silence Suzuka! She's making her great escape! 
<story>Pulling away from the pack as they enter the final straight!

data.text:
200m left! Whoa! "Last Year's Champion" and "Empress 
Air Groove" has caught Silence Suzuka!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>200m left! Whoa! "Last Year's Champion" and "Empress 
<story>Air Groove" has caught Silence Suzuka!

data.text:
This race has become a showdown between these two! 
A fierce battle! Inside?! Outside?!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>This race has become a showdown between these two! 
<story>A fierce battle! Inside?! Outside?!

data.text:
Just slightly from the outside, Air Groove crosses the goal 
first! Air Groove, magnificiently conquers this G1 stage!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Just slightly from the outside, Air Groove crosses the goal 
<story>first! Air Groove, magnificiently conquers this G1 stage!

data.text: On your first race as a member of team <Sirius>, good work.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>On your first race as a member of team <Sirius>, good work.

data.text:
If possible, I would have liked to stay in front 
until the end but, the result was 6th place.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>If possible, I would have liked to stay in front 
<story>until the end but, the result was 6th place.

data.text:
Yeah but you still looked like you were enjoying yourself out 
there. Even now, [I had fun] is written all over your face.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Yeah but you still looked like you were enjoying yourself out 
<story>there. Even now, [I had fun] is written all over your face.

data.text:
Yeah but you still looked like you were enjoying yourself out 
there. Even now, [I had fun] is written all over your face.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Yeah but you still looked like you were enjoying yourself out 
<story>there. Even now, [I had fun] is written all over your face.

data.text: Fufuu…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Fufuu…

data.text:
Even though it should be more difficult to win like this, 
the "scenery" that spreads before my eyes is very beautiful…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Even though it should be more difficult to win like this, 
<story>the "scenery" that spreads before my eyes is very beautiful…

data.text:
You'll definitely be able to see even more beautiful "scenery" 
from now on. Since your feelings are overflowing to this extent.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>You'll definitely be able to see even more beautiful "scenery" 
<story>from now on. Since your feelings are overflowing to this extent.

data.text:
And I'm really excited too. That I get to continue watching over 
you as you reach out to take hold of that "scenery".
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>And I'm really excited too. That I get to continue watching over 
<story>you as you reach out to take hold of that "scenery".

data.text:
And I'm really excited too. That I get to continue watching over 
you as you reach out to take hold of that "scenery".
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>And I'm really excited too. That I get to continue watching over 
<story>you as you reach out to take hold of that "scenery".

data.text: As I reach out and take hold of that "scenery"…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>As I reach out and take hold of that "scenery"…

data.text: So that's the "scenery" that Trainer-san wants so see, right?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>So that's the "scenery" that Trainer-san wants so see, right?

data.text: Yeah, I can hardly picture it clearly right now though-
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Yeah, I can hardly picture it clearly right now though-

data.text: Yeah, I can hardly picture it clearly right now though-
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Yeah, I can hardly picture it clearly right now though-

data.text: I get the feeling… it'll be an amazing "scenery".
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>I get the feeling… it'll be an amazing "scenery".

data.text: To that end, I'll also support Suzuka to the fullest.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>To that end, I'll also support Suzuka to the fullest.

data.text: To that end, I'll also support Suzuka to the fullest.
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>To that end, I'll also support Suzuka to the fullest.

data.text: Fufuu… understood.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Fufuu… understood.

data.text: Definitely, I'll show Trainer-san the "scenery" you want to see.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Definitely, I'll show Trainer-san the "scenery" you want to see.
